title: Bassist needed!
contents: Band seeks bassist into Hüsker Dü and Peter, Paul and Mary. Please – no chops.

title: Punk's not dead
contents: Punk will only die when corporations can exploit and mass produce it.

title: About today
contents: My baby loves me. I'm so happy. Happy makes me a modern girl. Took my money and bought a TV. TV brings me closer to the world.
